article_title: Cisco Systems Plans to Cut 6,000 Jobs
article_text:
Cisco Systems Inc. once again moved to cut jobs after reporting a quarter of little sales growth, saying it will remove about 6,000 employees from its payrolls.

The reductions, which amount to about 8% of the technology giant's global workforce, come as Cisco continues to struggle in emerging markets and in selling to cable companies and other service providers.

Cisco said it expects to record pretax charges of up to $700...
